entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 12 except minus 22 in a few localities.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 12 except minus 22 in a few localities. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 8 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind west 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 8 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 1.
